summary: Provides an immutable 2D vector type that can be created from Cartesian coordinates or polar form, offers read‑only access to x and y, computes magnitude and angle (in radians or degrees), supports arithmetic operations returning new vectors, and includes functional helpers to produce altered copies with different components, length, or orientation.
business_intent: Supply a reliable, side‑effect‑free vector abstraction for geometric calculations needed in layout, drawing, animation, and physics within the Flet UI framework.
